documents.document: And as I say, don't pay attention to protests. The real story is always somewhere else. https://t.co/vegor1Rb1g
@chriskkenny I thought it was called a tree
@ScottRhodie Oh that's glorious. I'm imagining the confused hilarious looks at airports.
@ScottRhodie Please tell me this is what it comes up as when you make it a hotspot
The most amazing thing about this immigration fight has been American liberals quoting Leviticus at me approvingly.
Just been offered a special on a Rousseau burgundy. I think I'd be more comfortable with a Burke chablis, to be honest.
Freezer bingo pays off with a container of really excellent pulled pork ragu and bottle-shop bingo pays off with "gimme a Tanqueray, thanks"
I understand that Hillary Clinton Democrats have started a new foreign policy protest coalition, 'Bombs Not Bans'. Catchy, eh?
@benpobjie I was addicted to that show when I first moved here as part of acculturation process. Amazed Toadie still alive.
@benpobjie I cannot believe you are live tweeting Neighbours.
@GrayConnolly @ellehardytweets or 17 cheeky bourbons at northies
@James_Jeffrey I ... I think that would be best.
@James_Jeffrey I guess you could say it was the ... takeaway ... of that experience. OK, I'll see myself out.
@James_Jeffrey It will all be worth it if one of the kids comes home needing help with a project on surface tension.
@ellehardytweets @GrayConnolly Walk until you feel like you're going to die and then walk home.
@KJTorrance @JayCostTWS Any mention means even money on a correction tbh
A very hip Thai place up the street gave me nothing but chopsticks to eat a bowl of soup. That lunch took four hours.
Looks like Twitter got its Con-Law Degree from Woke University.
@wrdcsc Particularly when you're trying to get a table booking for 8.
@ScottRhodie worse policy development and implementation. Suspect the immigration EO was disaster because no trust in holdover officials.
@ScottRhodie Maybe maybe not but comparisons to Sat Night Massacre don't hold. Immediate danger is empty bureaucracy leads to (cont'd)
@SimonThomsen Ah, here's your problem: https://t.co/hPSX8EaWo6
@ScottRhodie Again, remains for independent judiciary to determine constitutionality and legality - when he fires judges we have a problem.
@ScottRhodie All I'm saying is that it's not for the A-G to make the call, that's for a judge. Breaking that wall is actually worse.
@Colgo @BIAUS I'm learning.
@ScottRhodie Sorry mate if she's not carrying out legal orders she should move on.
@Colgo @BIAUS Not sure why this is news. Previous admin appointee refuses to follow new admin's legal orders. Time to go. Right?
More Saturday Night Fever than Saturday Night Massacre.
@JZmirak "Ah, Germany. The Washington Generals of the History Channel." --Homer Simpson
@SquigglyRick Yeah tell it to HR mate
@clairlemon One can imagine Times readers: "Ham Lake! Toooo perfect!"
Has anyone thought of the deadweight compliance costs of ensuring that businesses are woke?
This and what follows is very good. https://t.co/U7BFRqZj2k
Can we make up our minds as to whether Trump is evil for banning "all Muslims" or evil for not banning the Saudis, please?
@ReganDrew @HoddlesCreek Put me firmly in #teamburgundianlilt!
@ReganDrew @HoddlesCreek Looking forward to this vintage. Noted a change in style in recent years but good the Montrachet balance is there.
Executive orders are a terrible way to govern and set immigration policy. Particularly when you exclude Saudi Arabia.
Further to earlier issues with #eggsbenedict, if your hollandaise comes out of a food service company bucket, don't bother.
@DanLew4U Pronounched "cheap hotel", surely.
They got it right this time! Me in @dailytelegraph on the excellent pick for 2017 #AustralianoftheYear #auspol https://t.co/1lZOBsit28
Great return visit to @WasabiNoosa just now...so many treats in the omakase, and fascinating drinks. Duck-dashi broth a meal in itself.
Fascinating piece via @tabletmag ... warning to America: crowds are not democracy, just the opposite. https://t.co/9xrS7gxMf9
Oh well done with the photo filters, Facebook! #daylateandadollarshort https://t.co/pvxyBVMMg5
If you want to make arguments for free trade, and you should, it helps to get the difference between retail price and price at the border.
It's Australia Day out there, people. Make sure your pets have plenty of water and barbequed sausages.
Truth. Samsung phones are garbage, even if they don't explode. https://t.co/p6wBBIRejl

@deniseshrivell DC voted ~95% for Obama, ~5% for Trump. May have something to do with numbers.

Trump's speech better on 2nd listen, esp. in context of panicked commentary. What country would they have the US put first? #Inauguration
@GrayConnolly And forgotten nothing
@GrayConnolly It has vastly improved in my estimation listening to the bed-wetting.
@GrayConnolly It was not, forensically speaking, a great address. But as the last eight years have shown that's not the point.
Flipping between channels, it seems the American media have learned nothing and forgotten nothing. #InaugurationDay
@ScottRhodie I thiink we'll do.
That was ... not a great speech. But, as Obama showed, great speechifying does not a successful POTUS make. #Inauguration
@ScottRhodie Doesn't mean we can't try!
@carwinb Not ... great.
@ScottRhodie I can never hear that passage without humming...
@PR_atDMR It's ridiculous isn't it?

@marrowing I felt the same way about that other great kids' book, Infinite Jest.
Fellow #winos and #wine #drinkers 3 cheers to @VintecClub -- not only do they make a great product, but they stand behind it. So rare today!
Fellow Sydneysiders who complain about the soon-to-be bygone Baird, some perspective from Victoria. https://t.co/5YnZu3k3Bc
@suzanne2222 As you should be!
Here's an idea, why don't they just issue a list of everything that isn't offensive. It would certainly be shorter. https://t.co/eeENLRDXVu

There's a lovely irony in Mike Baird closing out his premiership at 10 o'clock ... a.m.
Last drinks for Baird then?
There's more neurosis around Australia Day than in the mid-career works of Philip Roth and Woody Allen combined.
"Single-herd milk" is now a thing apparently. Do they keep the cows on one side of the hill to really capture the microclimate, too?
Amazingly by causing celebs to boycott the Inauguration, the crass and vulgar Trump has begun to restore dignity to the office of POTUS.
Seriously though, was Wikileaks a Russian front when Manning was leaking, or did they only come in for the DNC phishing? @carwinb?
Democrats: OMG Trump is the biggest enemy-abetting threat to ever occupy the White House! Obama: Hold my beer. #Manning
Manning is a reminder of the days when Wikileaks did good by exposing military secrets rather than evil by sharing Podesta's risotto recipe.
Today's narrative: "Yeah, but Chelsea Manning passed stuff on to Wikileaks when they were the good guys!" Or something.
I think we need a moratorium on splain-splaining. And the boys loved my peroration on Scipio Africanus at the beach. https://t.co/vdogymo8Zv
@ScottRhodie @chriskkenny Only if the truffles I've got flying in from Alba don't clear Customs.
As during Dark Ages, Lindsay Lohan's conversion to Islam shows the Muslim world is there to preserve the high cultural treasures of the West
He's right. I'll be watching over a 3am Champagne brunch for one. https://t.co/i09Vu88jBS
Now that Ringling Brothers has closed the circus, will kids who want to run away go off and join the Greens?
@marrowing Guilty and Yes.
@clairlemon I love that I can now buy goods for 2/3rd the price that now last 1/2 as long.

@alanadimou Like, most Mondays after work.
@dannolan Nice. Sear them off afterwards? Incidentally 'roo is great with a morello cherry pan sauce.
@dannolan What cut/temp/time? Yes it's excellent for venison so presume very similar results...
Ah, @IWCouncil, where do I book collection of actual xmas tree, not branches, as in previous years? Website rather confused. Cheers.
Was just in the Gold Coast. Saw venison on zero restaurant menus. What's Clive Palmer talking about?
@booksbagshaw As an inner-westian I'm not surprised this is the epicentre. On the next street theres an epic passive aggressive parking war.
@alanadimou An alcoholic meditation into being and belonging.
